channel.title: Server Ideas - Systems (Help)
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I am new to the Runescape emulation community but have a much experience in the private emulation community in whole. I am coming from WoW Emulation which the main language was C++. My school course work is in Java so I have a decent handle on that. I would like to start a server BUT, I haven't played runescape in forever and I dont know what would be cool on a RS PS. I can code just about whatever, I just dont have the idea of what to code.
Also is there a best source for Old School client?(Source that I can modify- Preferably that works with an IDE!) For example in World of Warcraft Emulation the best Wrath of the Litch King source patch 3.3.5a source is and was Trinitycore: https://www.trinitycore.org/
So I guess I just need some help filling in voids that I dont know. Also if we have a person here interested in helping make a server that cant code but has experience and great ideas, lets talk!
What I am asking is, is there an equivalent in the Runescape Emulation Scene like once source that is the absolute best for old school? Not custom - Fresh and stable.
ALSO! MY BIGGEST QUESTION - Is the runescape emulation scene still alive and thriving. The wow emulation scene is dead and I dont want to join a dead scene!
What is the most popular RS Server EX Old School or new school or like what number?
I have capital and the coding skills to make something great so if anyone is interested in giving me some info / help, we could make something awesome!

item.title: Server Ideas - Systems (Help)
item.dc:creator: @KizL KizL
item.description:

[/quote][/quote]

item.title: Server Ideas - Systems (Help)
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Zoso_, post:4, topic:554136”][quote author=sini link=topic=673059.msg4500864#msg4500864 date=1450494426]

GitHub

apollo-rsps/apollo

apollo - An open-source Java game server suite designed to be lightweight, fast and secure.

About as good as it gets for RS2 (build 317)

https://github.com/Hadyn/mopar

RS2 (build 530) official server source (attempt #2)
[/quote]

We do not care for “RS2” in this section, sorry![/quote]

We do not care about your opinions of what you care to see on this forum, sorry!

What is the most popular RS Server EX Old School or new school or like what number?

Relevant to RS2.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Ideas - Systems (Help)
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

RSC emulation is mostly dead on the development side, but there’s a handful of moderately sized servers with communities built around them.

Read full topic
